name: RWBY Volume 4
summary: It's been several months since the Fall of Beacon, and the world of Remnant is still recovering. Tensions are high, lives have been lost, and the members of Team RWBY... are divided. Each of our heroines now faces a journey of their own.

eps.name: Character Short
eps.desc: It's been several months since the Fall of Beacon, and the world of Remnant is still recovering. Tensions are high, lives have been lost, and the members of Team RWBY... are divided. Each of our heroines now faces a journey of their own.

eps.name: The Next Step
eps.desc: It's been several months since the Fall of Beacon, and the world of Remnant is still recovering. Tensions are high, lives have been lost, and the members of Team RWBY... are divided. Each of our heroines now faces a journey of their own. While some must search inward if they ever hope to move on, others will venture out into the world in search of answers. Alongside the remaining members of Team JNPR, Ruby Rose has begun the long trek to the kingdom of Mistral, but the road ahead is full of surprises. New friends and enemies await, while the threat of an even larger catastrophe draws near.

eps.name: World of Remnant: Vale
eps.desc: Welcome back to the World of Remnant! In these mini-episodes, Qrow will walk us through the four Kingdoms of the world from his... perspective.

eps.name: World of Remnant: Faunus
eps.desc: Learn about Remnant's second humanoid species, the Faunus, as we explore their history and relationship with humanity.

eps.name: World of Remnant: Schnee Dust Company
eps.desc: The Schnee Dust Company is arguably the most influential business in the world of Remnant. Learn how it rose from nothing... and how it's changed over the years.

blog.title: RWBY Volume 4 sp地址
blog.summary:
SP主要是介绍下树不子世界的情况，包括地理或者历史等。整理下自己找到的熟肉地址吧。

ep.0 Character Short （就是第四卷预告片）【熟肉】
http://www.bilibili.com/video/av6525927/

ep.1 World of Remnant: Vale【熟肉】
http://www.bilibili.com/video/av7325 ...

blog.title: RWBY第一季第四卷？
blog.summary:
第一集，本以为会做得无比糟糕，没想到还能凑合看。
 就这一集的剧情彻底印证了一点：RT已经另起炉灶。第三卷的魔改不论成功与否，去Monty化的工作已经基本结束，接下来就看第四卷要怎么给RWBY这个IP续命了。

 首先是非MO风格的反派三基佬，单就形象塑造上还算可以，但这 ...
